verses.verse: Now <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H3808>no<s%> children: and she had an <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1904>Hagar.<s%>

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6113>restrained<s%> me from <S%H3205>bearing:<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H935>go<s%> in to my <S%H8198>maid;<s%> it <S%H194>may<s%> be that I may <S%H1129>obtain<s%> <S%H1129>children<s%> by her. And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8297>Sarai.<s%>

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> her <S%H8198>maid<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> had <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And he <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H1904>Hagar,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived:<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> her <S%H1404>mistress<s%> was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> My <S%H2555>wrong<s%> be on you: I have <S%H5414>given<s%> my <S%H8198>maid<s%> into your <S%H2436>bosom;<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> I was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you.

But <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H8198>maid<s%> is in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to her as it <S%H2896>pleases<s%> <S%H5869><s%> you. And when <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> dealt <S%H6031>hardly<s%> with her, she <S%H1272>fled<s%> from her <S%H6440>face.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> her by a <S%H5869>fountain<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> by the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar,<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai's<s%> <S%H8198>maid,<s%> from <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> you? and <S%H575>where<s%> will you <S%H3212>go?<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H1272>flee<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of my <S%H1404>mistress<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H7725>Return<s%> to your <S%H1404>mistress,<s%> and <S%H6031>submit<s%> yourself <S%H8478>under<s%> her <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H7235>exceedingly,<s%> that it shall not be <S%H5608>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you are with child <S%H2030><s%>and shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>

And he will be a <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H120>man;<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> will be against <S%H3605>every<s%> man, and <S%H3605>every<s%> man's <S%H3027>hand<s%> against him; and he shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of all his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

And she <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to her, You <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7210>see<s%> me: for she <S%H559>said,<s%> Have I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him that <S%H7210>sees<s%> me?
